org.intermine.web.struts

Class QueryBuilderChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • DispatchAction
      • org.intermine.web.struts.QueryBuilderChange

  • public class QueryBuilderChange
extends DispatchAction
    Action to handle links on main query builder tile.
